title: My World class 3 2018-2019  BBL-KBL
description: dit arrangement heeft een andere indeling die duidelijker is voor de leerlingen en die makkelijker in de planners is te zetten.

items.content:
Everywhere you go, you meet people. All those people are different, each has his or her own world.

In this lessonseries you are going to find out more about other people's lives and you will write about your life. This way, you can compare. In the end, you will compare to a guy named Chris, from Canada and write him an email!

First, we are going to watch a video where Chris introduces himself to you. You will answer questions about the video.
Open the video in a new tabsheet and do the test:

introduction.body: you are going to watch the video about Chris. Try to answer the questions as best as you can. Open the video in a new tabsheet and put the questions next to the video. Press pause if you need to. At the end you will get a score, save it to show your teacher how you've done.

prompt.body: Which day does Chris post his videos?
How old is he?
What kind of info does he give on you tube?
What is his addiction?
What is he afraid of?
What is his favourite food?
When does he record his videos?

items.content:
This Unit you will learn 4 lists:

  1. Social life
  2. Daily life
  3. Family
  4. Me

Go to www.quizlet.com and look up the lists. You will learn one list every week. Have a look at the planner to see which list to learn.

TIP! Make sure you practice at least 4 times a week, or you will have a hard time passing the test!

Do you have a Quizlet account? Log in and start learning!

Don't have a Quizlet account? Read the manual below to log in and find your class.
Go to quizlet and learn your first lit: My World: Social Life

Reading is just like doing sports: you have to practice to get better at it! For practice we use an online programme: ReadTheory. Today, you will just practice, next lesson, you will learn reading strategies to improve your reading skills, besides training.

Go to ReadTheory Your teacher has created an account for you and will provide you with a password. Log in to the webpage (top-right of the page!)

Select level 2. If you answer all questions correct, you will move on to the next level. If you fail one question, you will stay put. If you fail more than 1 question you will move back. Aim high! The higher your level, the better prepared you will be for the test. And... it's also great preparation for your exam!

Good Luck!

Personal Pronouns
Study the section on personal pronouns.

KB: Persoonlijk voornaamwoord

Watch the movie.

prompt.body:
Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

(Jullie) ...... are not in my class.

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

(Zij) ...... are all in the same class.

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

Are (jij) ...... in class 1A?

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

(Wij) ...... are new at school.

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

(Ik) ...... am new at school.

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

There is Tom. (Hij) ...... is new at school.

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

Is ....... (zij) in class 1B?

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

(Zij) ...... are pupils at this school.

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

Can you hear ...... (haar).

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

This message is for ...... (hem).

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

It is an invitation for ..........(mij).

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

I can hear ...........(jullie).

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

She can not find ..........(het).

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

Please, listen to ..........(ons).

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

You must send .............(hen) a postcard.

Welk persoonlijk voornaamwoord moet op de open plaats?

I can help .......(jou).

content.body:
Vul het juiste persoonlijk voornaamwoord in.

(Ik) work three days a week.
(Zij) lives in Essex.
(Jij) leave at 9.30 pm.
(Wij) are waiting for you.
(Hij) works three days a week.
(Jullie) live in Essex.
(Zij) leave at 9.30 pm.

Vul het juiste persoonlijk voornaamwoord in.

(Het) will be great if she comes.
John is late, because (hij) overslept.
The children are so happy, (zij) are singing.
Are (jij) leaving today?.
I'm sure (wij) have met before.
Please, listen to (mij).
I can hear (u).

Vul het juiste persoonlijk voornaamwoord in.

It's a invitation for (haar).
You must send (hem) a postcard.
Can you hear (ons).
She can't find (het).
This message is for (hen).
We can help (jullie).
Can you forgive (ons).
We gave (jullie) lots of cakes.
Give it to (hen).
I give (jou) a present.

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

is dreaming. (George).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

is green. (The blackboard).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

are on the wall. (The posters).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

is running. (The dog).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

are watching TV. (My mother and I).

are in the garden. (The flowers).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

is riding his bike. (Tom).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

is from Bristol. (Victoria).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

has got a brother. (Diana).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

Have got a computer, Mandy?

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

The teacher always gives homework. (The students).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

I am reading the book to . (My little sister).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

The boys are riding . (Their bikes).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

My father is writing a letter to . (John).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

I don't know . (The answer).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

Sally is going to . (Anne).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

Open please. (The window).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

Can you tell the way to the airport please? (The people).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

The books are for . (Peter).

Fill in the right personal pronoun.

Can you help , please? (Me and my sister).

prompt.body:
Choose the right personal pronoun for the sentences below.

Choose the right personal pronoun for the sentences below.

Lucie isn´t from Russia. ... is from Brazil.

items.content:
To be
'To be' is an irregular verb.
This means that it does not follow the rules regular verbs follow.
To be able to use the verb correctly, you simply have to learn the verb by heart.

Study the section about the verb 'to be'.

KB: Werkwoord to be

Do the following exercises:

prompt.body:
Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

She ..... nice.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

I ...... 12 years old.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

Kevin ...... 13 years old.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

Kevin and Jim ...... brothers.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

They ...... my friends.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

Robin and his friend ..... at school.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

I ...... a good swimmer.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

Sam and Sarah ...... cousins.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

Jim ..... a good singer.

Kies de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to be'.

They ...... good dancers.

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

I ... a girl.

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

My father ... at work.

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

... Trixi and Susi my cats?

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

The hamster ... in the cage.

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

I ... a painter.

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

My green pencil ... on the floor.

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

... Emma and Betty good friends?

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

... you from Scotland?

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

His sister ... seven years old.

Wat is de juiste vorm van het werkwoord `to be´in de volgende zin?

We ... good dancers.

content.body:
Fill in the correct form of the verb to be.
Pick from: Am - Are - Is (Do not use the contracted forms!)

Peter Baker from Manchester.
Jack and Peter from London?
London and Manchester cities in the UK.
Sandra at school today.

Fill in the correct form of the verb to be.
Pick from: Am - Are - Is (Do not use the contracted forms!)

Jack and Peter her friends.
They in the same class.
Their teacher sick today.
Tomorrow it is Saturday so then they free.

Fill in the correct form of the verb to be.
Pick from: Am - Are - Is (Do not use the contracted forms!)

Lucy and Amy British?
they best friends?
their teacher sick today?
the car mine?

items.content:
For your first post, you will write a short comment on Chris' video. Check out his video to see other comments.

At least write about:

@ Greet Chris and explain who you are (name, age, school)

@ Explain if and why (not) you like the video? why?

@ Write about at least 2 things you have in common with Chris.

For KBL, also take in mind:

@ KBL: use the correct personal pronouns and underline them.

@ KBL: use the correct forms of to be and underline them.

@ KBL: use at least 4 words/sentences from Quizlet list My world: Social life. (highlight those words!)

If you want to freshen up on your knowledge of how to write a comment on youtube, check out: http://www.wikihow.com/Leave-Comments-on-YouTube

Save your post in a word-document. Your teacher will tell you when to hand it in.

Have a good look at two different posts of classmates: Give positive and constructive feedback on the posts. Focus on:

- content (did your classmate cover the topic)

- KBL: correct use of personal pronouns

- KBL: correct use of the verb to be

- KBL: use of at least 4 words/sentences from Quizlet.

Work in groups of 3/4: two students do the speaking assignment. The other student(s) use the RUBRIC to evaluate them. Pretend you are skyping to Chris. Introduce yourself to him.

At least talk about:

@ do you like the video? why?

@ explain who you are.

@ talk about what you like/dislike about his video.

@ talk about at least 2 things you (do not) have in common with Chris.

Use your Quizlet vocabulary list and Chris' video for this assignment. Read the HAND-OUT carefully..

KBL: don't forget to give feedback on correct use of pronouns and the verb 'to Be'.
watch the video of Billy first:
Klik hier voor de Test
go to quizlet and study list My World: Daily Life

FIrst, watch the video about skimming and scanning. And this other video, too.

Today, you will learn about two different ways of reading a text: skimming or scanning. Read the instructions carefully! Ask your teacher where to hand in the worksheet.

When ready, log in at ReadTheory to practice and see how useful this training is!

Present simple
Study the section about the simple present. When and how can you use it?

KB: Simple present

content.body:
Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

I (to like) big cities.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

We footbal every Saturday.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

The Earth (to turn) around the Sun.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

Peggy (to live) in London.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

It (to cost) a lot to stay at luxury hotels.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

We (to have) a shower every day.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

It (to rain) a lot in winter.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

They (to start) work at 9 a.m. every day.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

You never (to eat) breakfast.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

Margaret (to speak) four languages.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

Tina is a teacher. She (to teach) French to young children.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

I always in this chair.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

My parents always to France.

Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

That man (to work) in a shoe factory.
It never (to rain) here in summer.
We sometimes (to walk) along the beach.
This (to be) a very easy exercise.
Mary (to like) the smell of roses.
I (to come) home early every day.

Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

The man often (to hurry) to his work.
You (to look) like Cindy Crawford!
I dance every weekend. Penny every weekend.
I wash clothes on Sunday. Susan clothes on Saturday.
I write letters every day. Dave emails every day.

Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

I box well. Mike very well.
I go to school by bus. Jill to school by bus.
I always kiss mum goodbye. She always mum goodbye.
I mix the eggs with the butter. Jane the eggs with the butter.
I teach French. Mr. Johnsson English.

Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

It every day in the Netherlands. (to rain).
We games every afternoon. (to play).
I in my sleep. (to talk).
He home after soccer practice. (to walk).
Derek many cartoon characters. (to draw).
After running they always a lot of water. (to drink)
We never any snacks after eight o'clock. (to eat)
You Idols every Saturday. (to watch)

Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

Tim many cartoon characters. (to draw).
He at six o'clock each workday. (to get up)
He to work and begins his job at eight o'clock. (to drive)
He to people on the telephone to help them. (to speak)
He doesn't give information until they a few questions. (to answer).
Tim callers their birth date. (to ask)
Sometimes a person incorrect information. (to give)
Tim watching TV after dinner. (to like)

items.content:
Grammartest

  • Personal pronouns
  • To be
  • Present simple

prompt.body: In welke zin is de verkeerde werkwoordvorm van to be gebruikt?

content.body: My mother and father are teachers.
Hey, boys! You are not paying attention!

prompt.body: In welke zin is de verkeerde werkwoordvorm van to be gebruikt?
In welke zin is de verkeerde werkwoordvorm van to be gebruikt?

content.body: My two brothers lives in Amsterdam.

prompt.body: In welke zin is de simple present verkeerd gebruikt?
Welke zin is niet goed?

Wat kan er op de puntjes?

Kathy ...... in the supermarket. She ...... in a bar.

Wat kan er op de puntjes?

...... she ...... in Amsterdam?

Welke zin betekent hetzelfde?

John helps his sister to do the dishes.

content.body: Him helps she to do the dishes.
Him helps her to do the dishes.
He helps she to do the dishes.
He helps her to do the dishes.

prompt.body:
Welke zin betekent hetzelfde?

The boys are watching the football game.

Welke zin betekent hetzelfde?

Sue helps her friends every day.

items.content:
You have just watched Billy's first vlog. You want to send him a typically Dutch postcard to let him know he has got viewers from all over the world. You also want to encourage Billy to keep vlogging. Billy has published a postbox-adress to contact him.

If you need some extra instruction on how to write a postcard click here postcard

@ Write the address on the correct part of the postcard:

Billy Wyatt, PO-box 4170, Sussex, England

@ start the postcard in a correct way

@ tell Billy what you like about his vlog

@ end the postcard in a correct way

FOR KBL ONLY:

@ KBL: write Billy your email address in a full sentence and tell him you would like to email him.

@ KBL: use the present simple correctly, as well as the personal pronouns and the verb to Be

@ KBL: use at least 4 words from Quizlet 'My world: social life and daily life'
You will watch and listen to Indi's vlog. After that you will answer some questions about the content of Indi's vlog:
Klik hier voor de Test
Practice your vocabulary for this week: My world - Families. Go to Quizlet and log in

Today, you will learn about two different ways of reading a text: using a dictionary. Read the instructions carefully! Ask your teacher where to hand in the worksheet.

When ready, log in at ReadTheory to practice and see how useful this training is!

Asking questions
Study the 'Kennisbank'.

KB: Asking questions - simple present

content.body:
Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
they - Canada? - in - live - Do

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
always - love - I - Will - you?

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
she - Is - time? - on

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
you - coming - today? - Are

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
my - bring - cats? - May - I

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
fancy - Does - her? - really - he

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
Can - you - well? - swim

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
she - Does - hard? - work - very

Maak met de woorden een vragende zin.
the - Can - phone? - he - answer

items.content:
Negations - Simple present
Take a look at the 'Kennisbank'.
Learn how and when you apply the simple present in the negation (= ontkennende) form.

KB: Negations - Simple present

content.body:
Maak een ontkennende zin door de juiste vorm van het werkwoord 'to do' (don't, doesn't) of 'to be' (isn't, aren't, 'm not) in te vullen.

You drink mineral wine.
Your teacher check your home work.
We live in Amsterdam.
Gary and Ken have a pet.
I live in Rotterdam.
He have a dog.
You play football.
Your cat climb trees.
I sick, that's for sure.
She quite right, is she?
We leaving at 9.30 pm.
They quite up to it.
They brothers.
We the champions.
She a nice teacher.
I 11 years old.

Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

I - fun - can - see - the - not - in - this.

values.value: ​I can not see the fun in this.

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

They - us. - not - will - help

Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

We - lots - money. - not - got - have - of

values.value: ​We have not got lots of money.

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

We - wear - uniform. - not- a - will

Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

Charles - is - boyfriend. - Amy's - not

Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

We - going - are - tonight.- cinema - not - to - the

values.value: ​We are not going to the cinema tonight.

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

My - like - fries. - does - dad - not - French

values.value: ​My dad does not like French fries.

content.body:
Maak een kloppende ontkennende zin.

This - minutes. - fifty - not - last - lesson - does

values.value: ​This lesson does not last fifty minutes.

items.content:
Grammartest

  • Asking questions - Question sentences
  • Negations
  • Peronal pronouns

items.content: POSTCARD to Indy

Writingassignment 2: Postcard to Indi Setyawan

You have just watched Indi's vlog. You want to send her a tipically Dutch postcard to let her know Holland is a great place to visit when she goes travel the world. You also want to compliment Indi on her creative way of vlogging. Indi has published a postbox-adress to contact her.

Indi Setyawan, PO-box 5720, Jakarta, Indonesia

@ write Indi's address on the postcard

@ start the postcard in a correct way

@ tell Indi in detail what you like about her vlog

@ write about similarities and differences between yourself and Indi

@ write Indi your email address and tell her you would like to email her.

@ use the present simple correctly, as well as the personal pronouns and the verb
to be

@ use at least 6 words from Quizlet 'My world: social life and daily life'

@ end the postcard in a correct way
Watch Billy's and Indy's video: write down the similarities and differences between them:
go to quizlet and study list My World: Me

Today, you will learn what signalwords are and how they can help you answer questions about a text.Go to lessonseries reading training and choose 'signal words'. Read the instructions carefully! Ask your teacher where to hand in the worksheet.

When ready, log in at ReadTheory to practice and see how useful this training is!

Woordvolgorde
Have a look at the following Kennisbank about word order (= woordvolgorde).

KB: Word order


Do the following exercise.

content.body:
Maak met de woorden een goede zin.

He - late - always - is
.
I - answer - tomorrow - that - letter - will
.
I - at - market - my - food - buy - the
.
You - always - can - count - me - on
.

Maak met de woorden een goede zin.

We - in - the - morning - our - brush - teeth
.
They - in - evening - burgers - eat - the
.
We - to - in - drive - school - morning - the
.
I - lunch. - sandwiches - for - eat
.

Maak met de woorden een goede zin.

I - to - go - at - work - o'clock - twelve
.
We - seven - at - thirty - eat - dinner
.
I - yesterday. - town - met - her - in
.
How - to - going - the - about - cinema.
.

Maak met de woorden een goede zin.

My - is - good - teacher - English - very
.
I - day - to - go - every - school.
.
I - at - up - o'clock - seven - get
.
I - late - got - yesterday - up
.

items.content:
Email to Billy:

Billy has sent you an email after he received your postcard. He wants to know more about you and your family.

http://oud.digischool.nl/en/schrijfvaardigheid/emailwriting.htm

@ your name, age,

@ at least 4 familymembers: name, age, relationship to you (father? uncle? etc.), occupation/school.

@ ask him at least 2 questions about his family.

@ write about at least 2 similar/different hobbies/interests
@ encourage Billy to keep on vlogging
@ write about at least 2 things you do NOT like (your dislikes)

@ use the present simple, personal pronouns, to be and questions and negation correctly.

@ use at least 8 words from Quizlet lists 'My world: social life, daily life,family

Remember that if you write an email, you need to follow some rules on how to start and end an email. To help you remind how this works, click on this LINK for rules on writing an email.

Email to Indi:

Indi has sent you an email after she received your postcard. She wants to know more about you and your family.

http://oud.digischool.nl/en/schrijfvaardigheid/emailwriting.htm

@ start your email in a correct way

@ write down your name, age,

@ describe at least 4 of your own familymembers: name, age, relationship to you (father? uncle? etc.), occupation/school.

@ ask Indi at least 3 detailed questions about her father, mother and boyfriend

@ write about at least 2 similar/different hobbies/interests, be specific
@ encourage Indi to keep on vlogging, tell her what makes her vlogs special
@ write about at least 2 things you do NOT like (your dislikes)

@ use the present simple, personal pronouns, to be and questions and negation correctly.

@ use at least 8 words from Quizlet lists 'My world: social life, daily life,family

Remember that if you write an email, you need to follow some rules on how to start and end an email. To help you remind how this works, click on this LINK for rules on writing an email.

Teacher's Page

Introduction

This lessonseries is designed for students in class 3KBL, as preparation for their first PTA Reading & Writing Test. The learning objectives are:

- Improvement of reading by

- Studying specific reading skills (skimming/scanning)

- Reading Practice (using Readtheory.org) aim for level 4

-Writing Practice notes/postcard/Email using grammar & vocabulary:

- Personal pronouns and the verb 'to be'

- Present Simple Positve

-negative/questions

- Word-order

- Vocabulary Training by:

- Class activities (mainly through speaking & creative activities)

- Independent training through Quizlet

- Implemented use of Vocab in Writing assignments

Lesson Plan

this lessonseries is built for 2 classes of 80 minutes each week and takes 4 weeks, followed by a bufferweek in which there's a Test for vocabulary and grammar and to finish things and revise. The 6th week is for the PTA tests: Reading 1 & Writing 1.
